attributes.action: STOP DISCRIMINATION BASED ON CONTRIBUTIONS MADE FROM INCOME TAX AND NATIONAL INSURANCE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Legislation currently dictates that Individuals who require grants from the government / local councils to attend funerals are automatically denied if the individual receives Contribution based benefits. If the Individual has not contributed they are automatically entitled. 

Therefore someone recently finding themselves unemployed has less entitlements that someone who has no intention of working

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
